Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that President Trump made the statement during the COVID-19 pandemic in 2020.
Understate: The claim understates the fact that President Trump did make the statement in November 2016, just not during the COVID-19 pandemic.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support to prove that President Trump made the statement during the COVID-19 pandemic.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that President Trump made the statement during the COVID-19 pandemic without sufficient evidence.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim does not consider the alternative explanation that the statement was made in November 2016, not during the COVID-19 pandemic.
